Name: Fruit Bonanza
About the game: Fruit Bonanza is an endless runner game in which the goal is to score the highest number of points. Various obstacles will hinder us in this Gameplay Map can't stop moving Dozens of different obstacles to avoid Collect fruits to gain even more points Survive as long as you can Features 4 different runners to pick 7 different themes to pick Increasing difficulty as the run progresses Relaxed and pleasant atmosphere
